Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $1200000. This offer represents a substantial discount compared to the market value of $1500000, allowing you to maximize your savings while securing this valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
